properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Father, we love You, we praise You, we adore You. Glorify Thy Name in all the earth.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Glorify Thy Name, Glorify Thy Name Glorify Thy Name in all the earth.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, we love You, we praise You, we adore You. Glorify Thy Name in all the earth.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Glorify Thy Name, Glorify Thy Name Glorify Thy Name in all the earth.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Spirit, we love You, We praise You, We adore You. Glorify Thy Name in all the earth.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Glorify Thy Name, Glorify Thy Name Glorify Thy Name in all the earth.{/lang-eng}
